title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in units, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Sales in units has increased over the Year.

Sales in units is slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max Sales in units about 371881.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Sales in units about 188077.0 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in units, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
